Azazil novel by Youssef Zidane 

Shocking historical novel, tells of events that have occurred in the Egyptian monk of the fifth century AD, which revealed many hidden in Christian history ..... 

The time they were created an uproar and angered the Egyptian Church was severely criticized by scholars of Christian theology ..... 

Dr. Yusuf Zidane brings us a Christian Theology in his book value "Azazil"


Dr. Yusuf Zidane, Researcher Egyptian thinker and a specialist in Arab heritage manuscript and Sciences. Many of his works and scientific research in Islamic thought and mysticism and the history of Arabic medicine. He is a moral contribution to the work of published fiction, as well as the articles and other periodic patrol in a number of Egyptian and Arab newspapers. A consultant to a number of major international organizations such as: UNESCO, the Organization of the ESCWA, the Arab League and other organizations. Ashraf has contributed to many field projects designed to map the heritage of the Arab manuscript dispersed throughout the world.
